    Scheduling & Managing Sessions

    Scheduling and managing text streaming session is easy and intuitive. There are many tools that make the experience simple. Here are just a few: Recurring Sessions, Presets/Templates, Calendar View, Group by Captioner, Automatic Sending of Transcripts, Reminder Emails, Quick Email of Session Links, Test Stream.

    Text Stream Viewing Experience

    Your clients will love the viewer interface. Clients that have esperienced 1CapApp want nothing else!

    Customer Support

    We pride ourselves on our excellent customer support. Call us! We can help you resolve your issues integrating your individual CAT software implementation with our service.

    Innovations

    The 1CapApp team is continually adding new functionality with no additional cost to our clients. In fact we find new ways where you and your clients can benefit from using our service. For Instance Sponsor Ads, & Twitter Tweets.

    Pricing

    One reason 1CapApp was born was because the two founders felt the currently available service was way too expensive. We promise to keep our prices at very affordable levels. Try us, chances are we can save you up to 40%.
